TestMeasure.description: A TestMeasureDefinition specifies a measure of a specific aspect of a product, service, or resource test, such as lost packets or connectivity status

accuracy.description: The number of digits of accuracy captured for Metrics associated

captureDateTime.description: The date and time that capture the metric

captureMethod.description: The method used to capture the Metrics. Note: This may be replaced by a set of entities similar to the Performance Monitoring Ref

metricHref.description: Hyperlink to access a metric for detail information

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the metric values, such as meters, cubic yards, kilograms [ISO 1000]

value.description: The value of Metric in the test. This also could be a documents to record all values got during the service test

valueType.description: A kind of value that the Metric value associated with a metricValue can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth
